plot: Dominic Littlewood follows the work of benefit fraud investigators as they track down, investigate and eventually prosecute benefit cheats.
plot_en: Dominic Littlewood follows the work of benefit fraud investigators as they track down, investigate and eventually prosecute benefit cheats.
plot_es: Dominic Littlewood follows the work of benefit fraud investigators as they track down, investigate and eventually prosecute benefit cheats.
title: Saints and Scroungers
